title: Fruity Slices Watch Faces
summary: A collection of smooth, bold and elegant watch faces inspired by sliced fruit.
description: A collection of watch faces designed for Android Wear and inspired by nature's colors and shapes.Classic Kiwi smooth browns and vibrant greens with black particularsWater Fun bold reds and emerald green with black detailsGrape Pink a feminine touch with orangish pink gradientsCoco White pure whites and greys with brown edges  Brand new Summer update!Orange DropLemon FreshAcid LimeEach watch face is optimized for both round and square screens.
descriptionHTML:
A collection of watch faces designed for Android Wear and inspired by nature's colors and shapes.

Classic Kiwi smooth browns and vibrant greens with black particulars
Water Fun bold reds and emerald green with black details
Grape Pink a feminine touch with orangish pink gradients
Coco White pure whites and greys with brown edges

Brand new Summer update!
Orange Drop
Lemon Fresh
Acid Lime

Each watch face is optimized for both round and square screens.
comments: Awesome New Fruits! This has been one of my favorite watch face collections. I had been waiting for some more fruits and now they're here! I look forward to which fruits will be added in a further update. Each fruit has such an excellent and clean design with colors that really pop. Keep up the great work!

Fruity taste Really like the stylized shapes and colours. Would appreciate an option to show a random slice on a given interval. I'd also like to suggest fruits like mangosteens for purple, tomatoes for deep reds and avocados for a brown/green look.
Very nice! Even prettier on a square watch face! Great buy for a buck, not disappointed!
Best dollar I have ever spent
recentChanges: - Rebuilt from the ground up: a big update to the under-the-hood engine, now open to be extended with new functionalities
- Three new fruits added to the collection: say hello to summer with Orange Drop, Lemon Fresh and Acid Lime!
- New configuration screen on the wearable device: now you don't need to chase the fruit you love on a tiny carousel anymore!
